// API calls for satellite hotspot data
export const fetchSatelliteData=async satellite=>{try{console.log(`Fetching ${satellite} satellite data from Flask backend...`);const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/${satellite.toLowerCase()}`,{method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);}const data=await response.json();console.log(`Received ${data.total||0} ${satellite} hotspots from backend`);return data.hotspots||[];}catch(error){console.error(`Failed to fetch ${satellite} satellite data:`,error);throw error;}};export const fetchVIIRSData=()=>fetchSatelliteData('VIIRS');export const fetchMODISData=()=>fetchSatelliteData('MODIS');
